languages.text: Each stack of {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Exploit{/g} used in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm's area gives it +1% Armor and +1% Dodge until the end of combat. Every 10 stacks give it +1 Deflection.

traits.locale_text: Each stack of {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Exploit{/g} used in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm's area gives it +1% Armor and +1% Dodge until the end of combat. Every 10 stacks give it +1 Deflection.

languages.text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +1% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que un enemigo situado en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del enjambre de servocráneos reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} o sea designado como objetivo de {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Exponer debilidad{/g}, cada {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidad{/g} que se elimine de ese enemigo otorga al enjambre de servocráneos +1 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el final del combate. Cada 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g} eliminadas le otorgan también +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un enemigo situado en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del enjambre de servocráneos reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} o sea designado como objetivo de {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Exponer debilidad{/g}, cada {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidad{/g} que se elimine de ese enemigo otorga al enjambre de servocráneos +1 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el final del combate. Cada 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g} eliminadas le otorgan también +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.

languages.text: 每当伺服头骨集群距离4格范围内的敌人被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，或成为{g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}暴露弱点{/g}的目标时，该敌人每移除1层{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}躲避{/g}就会提高1%，每移除10层{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就提高1点，上述效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当伺服头骨集群距离4格范围内的敌人被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，或成为{g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}暴露弱点{/g}的目标时，该敌人每移除1层{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}躲避{/g}就会提高1%，每移除10层{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就提高1点，上述效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Lorsqu'un ennemi se trouvant dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} ou subit les effets de {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Mise en évidence des points faibles{/g}, chaque cumul de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g} qui lui est retiré octroie à l'essaim de servocrânes +1 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Chaque retrait de 10 cumuls de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g} octroie un cumul de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un ennemi se trouvant dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} ou subit les effets de {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Mise en évidence des points faibles{/g}, chaque cumul de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g} qui lui est retiré octroie à l'essaim de servocrânes +1 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Chaque retrait de 10 cumuls de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g} octroie un cumul de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}.

languages.text: Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} veya {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Zayıflığı İfşa Et{/g} kabiliyetinin hedefi olduğunda hizmelet sürüsü, o düşmandan kaldırılan her {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürü{/g} için +%1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Kaldırılan her 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürü{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazandırır.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} veya {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Zayıflığı İfşa Et{/g} kabiliyetinin hedefi olduğunda hizmelet sürüsü, o düşmandan kaldırılan her {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürü{/g} için +%1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Kaldırılan her 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürü{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazandırır.

languages.text: Когда противник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} или становится целью {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Выявления слабостей{/g}, каждая снятая с него {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимость{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} роя сервочерепов на 1% до конца боя. Также каждые 10 снятых {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимостей{/g} предоставляют фамильяру +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда противник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} или становится целью {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Выявления слабостей{/g}, каждая снятая с него {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимость{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} роя сервочерепов на 1% до конца боя. Также каждые 10 снятых {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимостей{/g} предоставляют фамильяру +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}.

Когда противник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} или становится целью {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Выявления слабостей{/g}, каждая снятая с него {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимость{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} роя сервочерепов на 1% до конца боя. Также каждые 10 снятых {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимостей{/g} предоставляют фамильяру +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}.

languages.text: サーボスカルスウォームの周囲 4 セルにいる敵が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中した場合{/g} 、または{g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}弱点の露呈{/g} の対象となった場合、その敵から{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}エクスプロイト{/g} を取り除くごとに、戦闘終了時までサーボスカルスウォームに+1%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g} を与える。{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}エクスプロイト{/g} を 10 個取り除くごとに、+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} を付与する。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: サーボスカルスウォームの周囲 4 セルにいる敵が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中した場合{/g} 、または{g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}弱点の露呈{/g} の対象となった場合、その敵から{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}エクスプロイト{/g} を取り除くごとに、戦闘終了時までサーボスカルスウォームに+1%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g} を与える。{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}エクスプロイト{/g} を 10 個取り除くごとに、+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} を付与する。

languages.text: Wenn ein Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} oder Ziel von {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Schwäche offenlegen{/g} wird, gewährt jedes von diesem Gegner entfernte {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g} dem Servoschädel-Schwarm bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Jeweils 10 entfernte {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g}-Stapel gewähren ihm +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or becomes the target of {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, each {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploit{/g} removed from that enemy grants the servo-skull swarm +1% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat. Every 10 {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} removed grant it +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

Jeweils 10 entfernte {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g}-Stapel gewähren ihm +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}.
